# VitalPlate

VitalPlate is a Korean meal-planning web app focused on practical weekly meal plans based on body metrics, goal, lifestyle, and allergies.

## Canonical
- https://product-builder-2-2sb.pages.dev/

## Primary Pages
- / : meal planner and generated 7-day plan
- /guides : guide hub
- /guide-diet : fat loss guide
- /guide-muscle : muscle gain guide
- /guide-office : office worker guide
- /guide-focus : focus/study guide
- /guide-allergy : allergy-safe guide

## Policy and Trust
- /editorial-policy : editorial standards, source policy, update cadence
- /about : service overview
- /privacy : privacy policy
- /terms : terms of use
- /contact : contact

## Data and Crawl Signals
- /sitemap.xml
- /rss.xml
- /robots.txt

## Content Notes
- Health content is informational and not medical diagnosis or treatment.
- Allergy and safety checks should be re-verified by users before actual consumption.
